title: Static and voyage data AIS
description: An AIS message used to report static or voyage related data.

ais_message_type.description: The message type of the given AIS measurement

ais_version_indicator.description: An indicator for the version the user has on his AIS device.

imo_number.description: The International Maritime Organization (IMO) number is a unique identifier for ships

callsign.description: The call sign of the given AIS entity, '@@@@@@@' is default

entity_name.description: The name of the AIS entity

ship_type.description: The type of vessel given by the AIS, default is 0 ('Not available')

eta.description: Estimated date and time of arrival

max_draught.description: Maximum present static draught in meters

destination.description: Destination of the vessel, Maximum 20 characters
